post:
Hello guys,

Today is an important day in Kosovo, it's our independence day and we're giving **30%** discount in our VPS and Dedicated Server plans.

**Coupon Code:** KV1720 _(valid until tomorrow, 18 Feb)_


**Company:**
-IllyHosting (ILLYSOFT LLC) is a registered company located in Kosovo (Reg No. #811279795).
-We are a vps and dedicated servers provider, our servers are located in our own data center in Prishtina, Kosovo and are fully owned by us.
-I'm going to provide you with vps & dedicated servers packages below, we offer a great support and we are ready to assist you on our live chat.

-Payment methods: PayPal, Credit Card, Bank Transfer
-Datacenter Location: Prishtina, Kosovo
-ASN: AS207817 - ILLYSOFT, AL
-Speedtest Server: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/
-Looking Glass: https://lg.illyhosting.com/
-Test ip: 194.5.235.3
-Test file: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/1GB.bin
-Setup time: 15-30 minutes after payment.
-VPS Control Panel: Virtualizor Control Panel (Power control, reinstall your VPS, traffic stats, disk stats, etc).
-IPMI interface to manage dedicated servers.
-BGP session possibility for dedicated servers.


**VPS 1:**

RAM: 512 MB

Bandwidth: 1000 GB
